entities.description: Best estimate of the number of days missed from school due to skipping or cutting classes.
Combined count of the number of days missed from school due to skipping, taking both valid and less specified responses into account.
Indicates whether any immediate family member is currently serving in the US military.
Indicates whether the respondent's spouse or partner is currently serving in the US military.
The survey being conducted to collect information on various topics.
The individual responding to the survey questions.

relationships.description: Indicates the number of days the respondent missed school due to skipping or cutting classes.
Indicates the combined number of days the respondent missed school from skipping.
Indicates whether any immediate family member of the respondent is currently serving in the US military.
Indicates whether the respondent's spouse or partner is currently serving in the US military.
